scripts.rest-api: npm run rest-api:remove && npm run rest-api:copyOpenApiJson && npx openapi-merge-cli && npm run rest-api:generate
scripts.rest-api:copyOpenApiJson: npm run rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:booking && npm run rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:device && npm run rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:user
scripts.rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:booking: shx mkdir -p src/app/shared && shx cp ../isomatic-booking/build/openapi.json src/app/shared/openapi-booking.json
scripts.rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:device: shx mkdir -p src/app/shared && shx cp ../isomatic-device/build/openapi.json src/app/shared/openapi-device.json
scripts.rest-api:copyOpenApiJson:user: shx mkdir -p src/app/shared && shx cp ../isomatic-user/build/openapi.json src/app/shared/openapi-user.json
